description: * **[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/)**: A JavaScript runtime. * **[Mocha](https://mochajs.org)**: A feature-rich JavaScript test framework running on Node.js and in the browser, making asynchronous testing simple and fun. * **[Chai](http://chaijs.com)**: A BDD / TDD assertion library for node and the browser that can be delightfully paired with any javascript testing framework. * **[Sinon](http://sinonjs.org)**: Standalone test spies, stubs and mocks for JavaScript. Works with any unit testing framework.
